name: Museo Reina Sofía
description: Spain's national museum of 20th-century and contemporary art, home to Picasso's Guernica and works by Dalí and Miró.

name: Museo del Prado
description: One of the world's finest art galleries, featuring masterpieces by Velázquez, Goya, and other Spanish masters.

name: Rijksmuseum
description: The Netherlands' national museum showcasing 800 years of Dutch art and history, including masterpieces by Rembrandt and Vermeer.

name: Van Gogh Museum
description: The world's largest collection of Van Gogh's paintings, drawings, and letters, telling the story of his life and artistic journey.
